thread.title: Rand Paul: Trump's Just 'Expressing His Opinion,'...
thread.title_full: Rand Paul: Trump's Just 'Expressing His Opinion,'...

title: Rand Paul: Trump's Just 'Expressing His Opinion,'...

organizations.name: media’s previously soft treatment of trump

text:
The Media’s Previously Soft Treatment of Trump is the Best Evidence His Latest Charge is Correct video Rand Paul: Trump’s Just ‘Expressing His Opinion,’ I’m Not Seeing Any Efforts to ‘Limit the Press’ by Josh Feldman | 10:15 am, February 19th, 2017 Sen. @RandPaul : "I haven't seen any legislation coming forward that wants to limit the press. I see Pres. Trump expressing his opinion." pic.twitter.com/QXtJbXWvxD 
— ABC News Politics (@ABCPolitics) February 19, 2017 
Senator Rand Paul reacted to President Trump ‘s tweet about the press being the “enemy” today by saying he’s not too concerned so long as there’s no legislation in the works to “limit the press.” 
ABC’s Jon Karl asked him if he has concerns about the tweet. Paul said it’s certainly not something he would have said, but he does agree that there’s serious media bias issues out there. 
Karl brought up John McCain saying yesterday that attacking and cracking down on the press is how dictatorships start . 
Paul took some shots at McCain on foreign policy before saying, “I haven’t seen any legislation coming forward that wants to limit the press. I see President Trump expressing his opinion, rather forceful in his own distinct way, but I see no evidence that anybody is putting forward any kind of legislation to limit the press.” 
He went right back to McCain and said that criticisms of Trump are “colored by his own personal dispute” with the president. 
You can watch a clip of his remarks above, via ABC. 
[ image via screengrab ]
